text:
EDEKA | UI / UX Designer, Software Engineer | Hamburg, Berlin | ONSITE INTERNS https://www.edeka.de

EDEKA is Germanys largest grocery chain. I am with the innovation and prototyping team and we build and evaluate new ideas related to food tech. We are a fairly small team (8 people) and are looking for software engineers and designers that like to try out lots of new ideas.

If you are interested in building the future of shopping with us, contact me at nicholas.wittstruck@edeka.de
